pullrequest.title: Do not export urdf symbols in sdformat 1.4 (-> sdf_1.4)

content.raw:
You can use `c++filt` to go back to the c++ prototype. Apparently, some functions are still leaked... You must also tag functions if necessary. Some are missing here apparently (unless they are really part of the ABI).

For instance:

```
$ c++filt _ZN19urdf_export_helpers10values2strEd
urdf_export_helpers::values2str(double)
```

This is another reason why putting everything hidden and then uncovering the necessary symbols is an easier approach ;)
content.html:
You can use c++filt to go back to the c++ prototype. Apparently, some functions are still leaked... You must also tag functions if necessary. Some are missing here apparently (unless they are really part of the ABI).

For instance:

$ c++filt _ZN19urdf_export_helpers10values2strEd
urdf_export_helpers::values2str(double)

This is another reason why putting everything hidden and then uncovering the necessary symbols is an easier approach ;)
